sentences.en: At the SEATTLE AIRPORT, Sam is seeing Victoria off.
sentences.cn: (在西雅图机场, 山姆在为维多利亚送行. )

sentences.en: But we live in Seattle now.
sentences.cn: 但是我们现在住在西雅图。

sentences.en: He'd gone to Seattle long after everything else in his life had changed.
sentences.cn: 他生活中的其他一切都改变了，很久之后他去了西雅图。

sentences.en: Highten Heightened security is also in at Seattle's port.
sentences.cn: 升级的安全系统还用在西雅图的港口.

sentences.en: I went down to L.A. all the way from Seattle.
sentences.cn: 我从西雅图一路南下到洛杉矶。

sentences.en: In 1979 , Microsoft , with about 15 employees, moved its headquarters to Seattle, Washington.
sentences.cn: 1979年, 当时雇员大约有15人的微软公司将总部迁到华盛顿州的西雅图.

sentences.en: It is in the Seattle neighbourhoods, especially those on the hill - tops, that the conservation elements dwell.
sentences.cn: 就西雅图的邻里, 尤其是山岗顶端那些邻里的情况来看,那里常是保守的 、 守法的、遵守道德规范的人居住的地方.

sentences.en: It is Sleepless in Seattle. Have you seen it?
sentences.cn: 《西雅图不眠夜》, 看过 吗 ?

sentences.en: Seattle is fertile ground for small businesses.
sentences.cn: 西雅图是适合小型企业发展的沃土。

sentences.en: The arts editor of the Seattle Times was helpful.
sentences.cn: 西雅图时报的艺术编辑帮了我的忙.
邮戳上的字是:“65.9.12, 华盛顿, 西雅图. ”

sentences.en: The ship was docked at Seattle.
Then the Chamber of Commerce offices in Bellingham and Seattle.
sentences.cn: 然后是贝灵汉和西雅图的商会办公室.

sentences.en: They still live in Seattle, where they have three children together.
sentences.cn: 他们依旧居住在西雅图，并且有了三个孩子。

sentences.en: This view is countered by Peter Ward, of the University of Washington in Seattle.
sentences.cn: 西雅图华盛顿大学的彼得-沃德反对这种观点.

sentences.en: Where do you live in Seattle?
You'll have to change planes at Seattle.
sentences.cn: 你得在西雅图换乘另一架飞机.
